menu.name: The Tommy
menu.description: The Tommy is made with fresh squeezed lime juice, agave, and Casamigos Blanco Tequila. If you like a classic citurus sensation, this is the drink for you!

menu.name: Ms. Short Cake
menu.description: Ms. Short Cake is made with fresh squeezed lime juice, agave, strawberry pure, and Don Julio Blanco Tequila. You can't go wrong with the sweet, yet tangy margarita!

menu.name: Holy Shh-pice
menu.description: Holy Shh-pice is made with fresh squeezed lime juice, fresh squeezed cucumber juice, agave, muddled serrano pepper, and Patron Silver Tequila. If you're a risk taker and like a little spice in your life, what's holding you back?!

menu.name: Sugar High
menu.description: Sugar High is made with fresh squeezed lime juice, fresh squeezed watermelon, agave, and Milagro Blanco Tequila. If you love Harry Styles as much as we do, it's time to get 'Watermelon Sugar High'!

menu.name: MAN-go away
menu.description: MAN-go away is made with fresh squeezed lime juice, mango pure mixed with tajin, agave, and Espolon Blanco Tequila. This is the perfect margarita for a quick mental escape. With it's tropical flavors and unique spice we can say GOODBYE New York winter! At least for a moment with every sip.
